metadata.title: CVE-2019-17576 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Dolibarr 10.0.2. It has XSS via the "outgoingemail setup" feature in the /admin/mails.php?action=edit URI via the "Sendall emails to (instead of real recipients, for test purposes)" field.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
